backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor managing user data, finance entities, and new bank connections with authorization and migration support.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module adding empty bank connection fields to existing actor state and initializing new IDs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking new bank connection and sync features to related frontend files and requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend component, page, and utility file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styling defining light/dark themes and color variables using OKLCH values.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining page metadata, favicon, and React root mount point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, authentication gating, theming, and integrates the Bank Connections page.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Wrapper that loads the user profile and triggers the profile setup dialog before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginScreen: Internet Identity login page with styled sign-in button, loading state, and error display.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog that collects a user's name and saves it via a profile mutation.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Catego: Computes expense totals by category and renders a color-coded bar breakdown chart.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/QuickS: Calculates income, expenses, and net total and displays them in summary cards.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/TopCat: Identifies top expense categories and shows their totals and percentages.
Main app layout with navigation, user avatar menu, and route-aware header.
frontend/src/components/tags/TagChips.ts: Displays a compact list of tag badges with optional count overflow.
frontend/src/components/tags/TagMultiSel: Popover-based multi-select UI for choosing and removing tags.
frontend/src/components/tags/TagsManager: Tag management card allowing creation, listing, and deletion of tags.
frontend/src/components/transactions/Bul: Dialog component for applying bulk edits or deletions to selected transactions, supporting account, category, date, and tag changes. Manages form state, validation, and async edit/delete operations.
frontend/src/components/transactions/Csv: Dialog for uploading, parsing, validating, and importing CSV transaction data. Handles file selection, validation feedback, and submission to import transactions.
frontend/src/components/transactions/Tra: Dialog form for creating a single transaction with account, category, amount, date, and tags. Performs validation and submits data through a createTransaction mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when it changes. Integrates with Internet Identity and initializes access control.
frontend/src/hooks/useFinanceQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating finance-related data such as accounts, categories, transactions, budgets, and tags. Each hook interacts with the backend actor and manages cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking. Wraps AuthClient setup and exposes identity state to the app.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying global border and body styles.
frontend/src/lib/format.ts: Provides helpers to format currency and dates, using stored user settings to determine the active currency.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider, importing global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AccountDetailPage.tsx: Displays details for a single account, showing balance, transactions, and a dialog to add new transactions.
frontend/src/pages/AccountsPage.tsx: Lists all accounts with total balance and provides a dialog-driven flow for creating new accounts.
frontend/src/pages/BankConnectionsPage.t: Manages bank connections with create, delete, and sync actions, including status badges and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/BudgetsPage.tsx: Handles monthly budgets, category limits, and spending calculations with controls for navigating months.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesPage.tsx: Displays categories with totals for a selected date range and includes a dialog to create new categories. Fetches categories and related transactions to compute totals.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Provides a financial overview with date‑range‑filtered stats, charts, and onboarding prompts. Fetches transactions, accounts, and categories to render dashboard components.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Manages user settings such as preferred currency, persisted in localStorage per identity. Also includes tag management via TagsManagerCard.
frontend/src/pages/TransactionsPage.tsx: Displays and filters transactions, supports searching, CSV import/export, and bulk actions. Integrates dialogs for creating, editing, and importing transactions.
frontend/src/utils/transactionsCsv.ts: Implements CSV parsing, line parsing, validation, and helpers for working with transaction CSV data. Validates rows against accounts, categories, and tags.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, including hash‑based routing support. Provides sessionStorage-backed param persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining dark mode, content paths, extended theming with OKLCH colors, custom animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project version, feature status, priorities, architectural notes, and known build issues.
